item.title: Portfolio - Eric Carlisle : UI Developer, UX Designer
item.author: eric@ericcarlisle.com (Eric Carlisle)
item.description: Portfolio Listed below are professional engagements I've participated in during the last few years. I've spent much of my career as a consultant and in doing so have had the opportunity to work within a variety of verticals. LookingGlass Cyber Solutions Engagement: Full-Time, 3/2014 - 3/2015 Lookingglass Cyber Solutions transforms cyber-threat intelligence into threat knowledge using the ScoutPlatformTM platform of products, including ScoutVisionTM, CloudScoutTM, and ScoutInterxectTM.
